flawed_nl_solution:
30% of Mars is made up of other elements because 100 - 50 - 20 = <<100-50-20=20>>20
Mars weighs 750 tons because 150 / 0.2 = <<150/0.2=750>>750
The moon weighs 375 tons because 750 / 2 = <<750/2=375>>375
#### 375

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
